answers.answer: Congrats to you and your family!!  That's so exciting that he's here and I'm glad he is doing well!
Much blessings to you and your family, I'm jealous lol no very happy for you, enjoy every moment they grow too quickly.
Congrats! I am glad that he is doing much better and that your getting to enjoy him!
I just wanted to add that I took a look at the pictures you have posted of him and he is absolutely adorable!
congrats to you and your family!! james ryan is precious <3
He was born on my birthday  :)  I'm more than happy to share that day with your new little man!!  Congratulations!!!!
Aww...my brother wanted him to be born a few days later on his b-day but he didnt quite make it...lol.

question: I would have posted earlier but it has been literally crazy. So I was due to have my c-section on the 22nd but ended up getting an emergency c-section on the 18th due to severe preeclampsia. If that wasnt hard enough I didnt get to hold Ryan until the next afternoon around 1pm because he was under an oxygen tent and then I finally get him only to have to let him go under UV lights due to jaundice. Visiting the nursery to nurse him and see him just wasnt enough!! But I did get him on our discharge date and he got to come home which was awesome but on Thursday I had to take him for a check on the jaundice and the doc put him back in for monitoring due to a high heart rate. Turns out he is running in the normal range so the last few days the family and I have just been enjoying him. It has been a roller coaster but it was all well worth it cuz my lil man is HERE!!He is James Ryan, born February 18th at 6:41pm weighing at 8lbs 9oz and is 21inches long!I am posting a few pics to introduce him to the community of women that have been my rock in the craziness of this go round!! Thank you ladies!!
title: Baby Ryan is here!!
